title: Sleeping.Dogs.Limited.Edition-R.G. Catalyst
description:
Sleeping.Dogs.Limited.Edition-R.G. Catalyst

Year: 2012
Publication Type: RePack 
Tablet: {enclosing} SKiDROW
Version: 2.1
Language:  RUS,  ENG, Multi 7
Sound language:  ENG

Description: 

Welcome to Hong Kong, the city where the flickering light of neon 
lights intertwined with everyday life, a city whose exotic locations 
and seething streets hide one of the most powerful and dangerous 
criminal organizations in the world - Triad. In this open-world 
game you have to try on the role of Wei Shen, undercover cop who 
is trying to destroy the Triad gangs from the inside. Prove your 
value on the way to the tops of the organization, taking part in 
violent criminal operations, and do not let the criminals to 
reveal themselves. Torn between loyalty to a police icon, and 
gangster code of honor, you have to gamble and not get lost in 
the blurry boundaries between truth, loyalty and justice.

Game Features

Adult and tough drama about a police undercover, which can open at any time.
The explosive action, flavored with a mixture of nuclear lethal martial arts, 
hot shootings and violent clashes.
Mad adrenaline pierce the streets and tear of the sea with a huge fleet 
of exotic cars, sport bikes and speedboats.
Hong Kong - your personal playground: participate in illegal races, 
bid in cockfights or relax in karaoke. In areas of the city are countless 
ways to have fun.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1) 
Processor: Intel Core  i5-750 or AMD  Phenom  II X2 565 
RAM: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce  480 or ATI  Radeon  HD 4870 with 1024 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Free hard disk space: 11.5 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features  

Do not cut / no recoded 
Optional installation of HD Texture Pack

Additional content{DLC}

The Dragon Master Pack 
Square Enix Character Pack 
Retro Triad Pack 
Top Dog Silver Pack 
The High Roller Pack 
The Red Envelope Pack 
Top Dog Gold Pack 
High Resolution Texture Pack 
Street Racer Pack 
Tactical Soldier Pack 
The SWAT Pack 
Screen Legends Pack 
Nightmare in North Point 
Ghost Pig 
Drunken Fist Pack 
Gangland Style Pack 
Zodiac Tournament 
Movie Masters Pack 
Monkey King Pack 
Law Enforcer Pack 
Wheels of Fury

Installation time ~ 10 minutes 
Repack by R.G.Catalyst
